title: New 'Tolkien' inspired skins for Warwick, Rengar, Volibear & Udyr!
body:
Maybe just for Warwick, cuz I love his speed & I favour his ult.

I have been playing lol mostly with Ww for around 2 years, (I also LOVE Banehallow from Dota 1).
Some of my Hallowed builds had almost 5 perceptible 'red crit numbers' on screenshot on the beast!
It was so kool back in the day!

I am so bored with my Tundra Hunter skin & I just brought my 1st gift card, ($25 for riot points).
Maybe one day I'll play ranked, (I'm homeless & I hear voices in my head often).
Some autistic high achiver I am, not.    Please favour my request.
